description: Add encryption layer to AMCP checkpoints
steps: Define encryption format: AES-256-GCM with key derived from AMCP private key via HKDF
Update checkpoint creation to accept --encrypt flag
Update resuscitate to detect encryption and decrypt accordingly
Verify: Checkpoint with --encrypt=full is unreadable without private key
Verify: Checkpoint with --encrypt=none remains plaintext (backward compat)
Verify: Resuscitate decrypts and restores correctly
